noteformat.title: NoteFormat
noteformat.subtitle: Your Smart Note & Expense Companion
noteformat.description: Capture expenses, format them with templates, and import/export easily. Track spending, budgets and reports‚Äîsimple, private, and beautiful.
noteformat.cardDescription: Capture expenses, format with templates, import/export easily. Track spending, budgets and reports. Free on the App Store.
noteformat.supportDescription: NoteFormat is developed with passion as an indie project. If you find the app helpful, consider supporting its continued development. Every contribution helps bring new features and improvements!
noteformat.tutorialsSubtitle: Learn how to get the most from NoteFormat

tutorials.videoTutorialsIntro: Watch quick video guides to learn NoteFormat features in action.
addingFirstNoteSteps: Open NoteFormat and tap the Notes tab
Tap the + button in the top right
Enter your note content, select a category, and optionally add an amount
Choose tags like "Card" or "Cash" to track payment methods
settingUpBudgetsSteps: Select the period: Daily, Weekly, Monthly, or Yearly
Adjust the alert threshold to get notified before exceeding
viewingReportsSteps: Select a period: Daily, Weekly, Monthly, or Yearly
View your spending summary and category breakdown
Pro users can see detailed pie charts and export to CSV
creatingCustomCategoriesSteps: Enter a name, choose an emoji, and set a template placeholder
Reorder categories by dragging or using Edit mode
tutorials.customizingTemplatesIntro: Templates control how your notes are formatted when exported. Available placeholders:
usingThemesSteps: Choose from preset themes or create custom ones
Custom themes require a Pro subscription
exportingNotesSteps: Select entries and choose a format template
Share via Messages, Email, Files, or copy to clipboard
Pro users can export as CSV for spreadsheet apps
importingNotesSteps: Review parsed entries and confirm import

features.noteOrganizationDesc: Create and organize notes with categories, tags, and customizable templates.
features.expenseTrackingDesc: Track daily expenses with budgets, alerts, and visual reports.
features.budgetManagementDesc: Set monthly, weekly, or yearly budgets with threshold alerts.
features.reportsAnalyticsDesc: Generate daily, weekly, monthly reports with category breakdowns.
features.icloudSyncDesc: Seamlessly sync your data across all your Apple devices.
features.gameCenterDesc: Unlock achievements and compete on leaderboards.
features.siriShortcutsDesc: Quick add notes and get reports using Siri commands.
features.privacyFirstDesc: Face ID/Touch ID lock with your data staying on-device and iCloud.

faqItems.whatIsAnswer: NoteFormat is an iOS app for organizing notes and tracking expenses. Create formatted entries with categories, tags, and amounts, then export them in customizable formats.
faqItems.dataSync: Is my data synced across devices?
faqItems.dataSyncAnswer: Yes! If you enable iCloud sync in Settings, your notes, categories, templates, and budgets sync automatically across all your Apple devices signed into the same iCloud account.
faqItems.proIncludedAnswer: Pro subscription includes: ad-free experience, unlimited exports, CSV report exports, custom themes, biometric lock (Face ID/Touch ID), and detailed category breakdowns in reports.
faqItems.cancelSubscription: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqItems.cancelSubscriptionAnswer: Go to your device's Settings > tap your name > Subscriptions > select NoteFormat > Cancel Subscription. You'll retain Pro access until the end of your billing period.
faqItems.siriUsage: Can I use Siri with NoteFormat?
faqItems.siriUsageAnswer: Yes! NoteFormat supports Siri Shortcuts. You can say things like "Add a note with NoteFormat" to quickly create entries or get reports.
faqItems.budgetAlertsAnswer: When you create a budget, you set an alert threshold (e.g., 80%). When your spending reaches that percentage of your budget, you'll receive an in-app alert. Budgets can be daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.
faqItems.achievementsAnswer: NoteFormat integrates with Game Center. You can earn achievements for milestones like creating your first note, maintaining streaks, exporting data, and more. Check the Achievements tab to see your progress.
faqItems.deleteData: How do I delete all my data?
faqItems.deleteDataAnswer: Go to Settings > Data Management > Delete All Data. This permanently removes all notes, templates, categories, budgets, and achievements. This action cannot be undone.

cat.title: Whity
cat.subtitle: Our beloved cat
cat.rainbowBridge: "Until we meet again at the rainbow bridge" üåà
cat.memoryParagraph1: This page is dedicated to Whity, my beloved cat who was by my side for over 5 wonderful years. From 12 July 2019 to 29 December 2024, Whity filled my life with unconditional love, warmth, and countless precious moments.
cat.memoryParagraph2: I will forever love and miss you, Whity. You were more than a pet ‚Äî you were family, a loyal companion, and a source of comfort through every day. Your memory lives on in my heart, always.

highlights.playfulSpiritDesc: Always curious and full of life
highlights.cuddleExpertDesc: The best lap warmer and companion
